titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the energy investment credit for solar energy and geothermal property against the entire regular tax and the alternative minimum tax.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S586)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the investment tax credit in connection with depreciable solar energy property and geothermal property against the taxpayer's entire regular tax liability and minimum tax liability.
